channel.title: Sandwiches on Heritage Bake Shoppe
channel.description: Recent content in Sandwiches on Heritage Bake Shoppe

item.title: Treble Topper
item.description: Treble Topper Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Treble Topper Take it to the next level with triple meats and cheeses! Talk about a full meal full of the flavors you love, custom built for you! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Cajun Turkey Roast Beef Black Forest Ham CHEESE: Muenster Colby PepperJack ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal.

item.title: Double Decker
item.description: Double Decker Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Double Decker For those with an appetite! Fill up with double meat and cheese, built especially for you! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Smoked Turkey Breast Labanon Balogna CHEESE: Muenster Colby ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.

item.title: Roast Beef and Cheddar
item.description: Roast Beef & Cheddar Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Roast Beef and Cheddar Indulge in the flavor of Roast Beef and Cheddar Cheese. Customize it with your choice of bread and toppings, and you'll have a new favorite lunch. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Roast Beef CHEESE: Cheddar ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Online orders are typically ready for pickup in 15 minutes or less.

item.title: Turkey and Swiss
item.description: Turkey & Swiss Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Turkey and Swiss Can't beat the delicious flavor of smoked turkey breast, swiss cheese, with fresh veggies on your choice of bread. item.title: Chicken or Hamburgers
item.description: Chicken or Hamburger Sandwiches HOME > SANDWICHES > Chicken or Hamburgers Fill up on a delicious grilled chicken or hamburger sandwich! Customize it to the perfect taste with toppings, cheese and more. BREAD: Homemade Hamburger Buns CHOOSE YOUR MEAT Grilled Chicken Hamburger CHOOSE YOUR CHEESE Colby PepperJack Muenster Cheddar Cojack Swiss American ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER KETCHUP Make it a meal.

item.title: Grlled
item.description: Grilled Cheese Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Grlled Looking for a quick and delicious meal that satisfies your cheesy cravings? Try our grilled cheese sandwich - a perfect combination of melted cheese and crispy bread that will leave you wanting more. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.19 Online orders are typically ready for pickup in 15 minutes or less.

item.title: Heritage Ham
item.description: Heritage Ham Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Heritage Ham Revel in the deliciousness of Black Forest Ham, Muenster Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Salt and Pepper. item.title: Design-Your-Own
item.description: Design Your Own Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Design-Your-Own Go for your own favorite custom taste with a sandwich made especially for you! Grab your favorite meal by choosing your bread, meats, cheeses, and add-ons. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan CHOOSE YOUR MEAT Roast Beef Black Forest Ham Carving Ham Turkey Breast Cajun Turkey Sweet Lebanon Balogna Balogna ADD DOUBLE MEAT? CHOOSE YOUR SECOND MEAT None Roast Beef Black Forest Ham Carving Ham Turkey Breast Cajun Turkey Sweet Lebanon Balogna Balogna ADD TRIPLE MEAT?
